mapper.insert: insert into app_evaluation (id, user_code, appointment_code, content, opt_time, doctor_code, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appointmentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_evaluation set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appointment_code = #{appointmentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_time = #{optTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_code = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_code, appointment_code, content, opt_time, doctor_code, state from app_evaluation
